title: Find LCD
text: What is the least common denominator of $$\frac{56}{72}$$ and $$\frac{y}{9}$$?

title: Multiply LCD Both Sides
text: Through multiplying both sides by LCD, we get $$56=8y$$.

title: Isolate $$y$$ on One side
text: We can divide by $$8$$ on both sides and get $$y=7$$ as the final answer.
